DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether atazanavir use influence endothelial dysfunction associate type 2 diabetes mellitus .

DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria ( important ) : 18 70 year type 2 diabetes mellitus treat diet , oral medication and/or insulin BMI 18 35 determinant renal hepatic function within twice upper limit normal range , abnormality lipid profile permit Exclusion Criteria ( important ) : history smoking within past year history current abuse drug , alcohol solvent current use antihypertensive , cardiac vasoactive medication clinical evidence cardiac pulmonary disease
